data: In the last year of the Emperor Tiberius I and my twin-brother Chrestus were found lying in one cradle, exposed with a great number of other babes upon the steps of the temple of Asclepius, in Pergamus, a city of Bithynia.
last year of the Emperor Tiberius I
Onesimus: Memoirs of a Disciple of St. Paul
